description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Shan Zafrani Garam Masala, a premium blend of aromatic spices. This 50g pack delivers rich, authentic flavor to curries, stews, and more.  Its unique saffron-infused recipe adds warmth and depth to any dish. 

Made with carefully selected ingredients, including saffron, cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves, this meticulously crafted masala offers consistent, high-quality taste. Shan's 'V-Locked' freshness ensures the vibrant aroma and flavor are preserved.  

Enhance your cooking with Shan's expertise.  Perfect for everyday use and special occasions. Add a pinch to your favorite recipes for an unforgettable taste experience. Order now!

Create restaurant-quality Korma at home with Shan Korma Masala! This authentic blend of spices delivers rich, aromatic flavor in every bite.  Simply add to your favorite meat or vegetable base for a delicious and easy meal.  Perfect for busy weeknights or special occasions.

This 50g pack contains a precisely balanced mix of premium spices, including coriander, cumin, turmeric, and more.  It's a convenient and reliable way to achieve consistent results every time.  Shan Korma Masala is free from artificial preservatives and additives.

Elevate your cooking with the trusted taste of Shan.  Follow the simple instructions on the pack for best results.  Order yours today and experience the difference!

Unleash the rich, aromatic depths of authentic Nihari with SHAN__NIHARI_MASALA!  Experience the succulent, melt-in-your-mouth tenderness this expertly blended spice mix delivers.  Transform ordinary meat into an unforgettable culinary masterpiece. Effortlessly create restaurant-quality Nihari at home.

Our meticulously crafted blend includes premium spices, carefully selected for their unique flavor profiles.  Each ingredient is sourced for quality and potency.  The convenient pre-measured blend ensures consistent results every time. Simply add to your favorite meat and follow the easy instructions.  No more guesswork!

Enjoy the satisfying aroma and intense flavor that will tantalize your taste buds.  Perfect for beef, lamb, or goat.  Impress your family and friends with this classic dish.  Order your SHAN__NIHARI_MASALA today and experience the difference!

Elevate your culinary creations with National Garam Masala Powder, a traditional blend of 7 carefully selected spices. This 50g pack delivers rich, aromatic flavor to curries, stews, and more.  Its finely ground texture ensures even distribution and consistent taste in every dish.

National Garam Masala is a versatile spice blend, perfect for both everyday cooking and special occasions.  The blend includes warming spices like cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves, creating a complex and delicious flavor profile.  This premium quality masala is free from artificial additives.

Enhance your dishes with the authentic taste of National Garam Masala. Add a teaspoon or two to your favorite recipes for an instant flavor boost. Order yours today and experience the difference!

Unleash the fiery fury of SHAN__ACHAR_GHOST!  Experience the ultimate ghost pepper achar, a tantalizing blend of spicy heat and tangy flavor. Perfect for adventurous palates, it adds explosive zest to any dish. Elevate your culinary creations with this authentic Indian pickle.


Crafted with premium ghost peppers and traditional spices, this achar boasts a vibrant red hue and an intensely satisfying crunch.  Each jar contains 200g of pure, deliciousness.  It's gluten-free and vegetarian, making it a versatile addition to your pantry.


Add a fiery kick to sandwiches, curries, or enjoy it as a side with naan.  A little goes a long way!  Order your jar of SHAN__ACHAR_GHOST today and experience the thrill!  Warning: Extremely hot! Handle with care.

Elevate your culinary creations with Shan Chaat Masala, a vibrant blend of spices perfect for adding a tangy kick to your favorite dishes. This 100g pack is ideal for creating delicious chaat, adding zest to snacks, or as a flavorful garnish.

Shan Chaat Masala is a unique blend of premium spices, expertly crafted to deliver a burst of flavor.  It's vegetarian-friendly and a versatile seasoning mix that enhances the taste of various dishes.  Use it generously for that perfect tangy spice finish.

Transform ordinary snacks into extraordinary treats!  Use Shan Chaat Masala to sprinkle over your favorite chaat recipes, or as a finishing touch on salads, fries, or even yogurt dishes.  Order yours today and experience the authentic Shan taste!

Create authentic Seekh Kababs with Shan's delicious seasoning mix! This 50g pack delivers the perfect blend of spices for juicy, flavorful kebabs.  Simply add to your ground meat mixture and grill to perfection. Impress your family and friends with restaurant-quality results at home.

Shan's Seekh Kabab Masala is a convenient and easy-to-use recipe & seasoning mix.  It's ideal for creating exclusive BBQ blends and is suitable for vegetarians.  Net weight: 50g (1.76 oz).

Elevate your BBQ game with Shan! This versatile masala adds depth of flavor and aroma to any meat or vegetable skewer.  Order yours today and experience the difference of authentic South Asian spices.

Enhance your cooking with National Pure Garlic Powder, a 50g pack of freshly ground garlic offering a strong aroma.  This premium powder delivers intense garlic flavor without the prep work, perfect for adding depth to any dish. 

Made from carefully selected garlic cloves, our powder is freshly ground to ensure maximum flavor and aroma. It's ideal for soups, stews, sauces, marinades, and more.  The convenient 50g pack is perfect for home cooks and professional chefs alike.

Elevate your culinary creations with the rich, bold taste of National Pure Garlic Powder. Add it to your favorite recipes or use it as a seasoning to boost the flavor of your dishes. Order yours today!
